title: Your stars today
text:
See what the stars have in store for you today.

MONDAY OCTOBER 7, 2019

ARIES March 21-April 20 **

Sharp words or sudden actions could land you in a heap of hot water today, especially involving personal or joint finances. So cool down and calm down, before you blow a fiery fuse!

TAURUS April 21-May 21 **

You think you know how a loved one is feeling but jumping to conclusions – without checking the facts first – is a recipe for trouble today Taurus. Take the time to really talk things through.

GEMINI May 22-June 21 **

Twins are in the mood to be rash! Making a snappy decision seems like a good idea but it could land you in trouble. Impulsive actions could also lead to an argument or accident so pace yourself.

CANCER June 22-July 23 **

Place your own issues on the backburner today Crabs. Putting others first works wonders, as you tune into the needs of family and friends. But expect some fiery words along the way.

LEO July 24-Aug 23 **

A colleague or relative will try to push your emotional buttons but avoid retaliating with rash words or hurtful comments. You can’t control what others say but you can control your reaction!

VIRGO Aug 24-Sep 23 **

A relationship with a relative or neighbour could flare up, as responsibilities overtake having fun. If you keep the lines of communication open, then the storm in a tea cup will soon blow over.

LIBRA Sep 24-Oct 23 ***

Avoid getting drawn into arguments or misunderstandings over money today. Plus postpone creative projects for another time, as it will be difficult to connect with your artistic inner muse.

SCORPIO Oct 24-Nov 22 **

Expect a hectic day where you’re running around all over the place. But are you actually achieving anything? If you pace yourself – and prioritise – then you’ll accomplish a lot more.

SAGITTARIUS Nov 23-Dec 21 ***

Pencil in some time in your busy schedule to be on your own, for some reflective R & R. If you run around on auto-pilot, then you’re more likely to make thoughtless mistakes and careless slip-ups.

CAPRICORN Dec 22-Jan 20 **

Finding fault with others won’t win you any friends or favours today. Children and friends are feeling particularly touchy. So avoid offering criticism – no matter how ‘constructive’ it is.

AQUARIUS Jan 21-Feb 19 **

Your Aquarian people skills are definitely required today, as loved ones indulge in family feuds or close friends get caught up in silly squabbles. Some deft diplomacy will see you through!

PISCES Feb 20-March 20 ***

There’s impulsive and erratic energy about, as the planets stir up your emotions. If you don’t slow down then you could blurt out something that you later regret, so pace yourself Pisces.

YOUR DAY

There’s explosive energy about so tread carefully.

HAPPY BIRTHDAY

When you are in the mood, you can be very charming. 2020 is the year to set realistic goals and then follow them through to completion.

description: See what the stars have in store for you today.
